info.description: Programmatic access to the Weblens server
info.title: Weblens API

parameters.description: Delete files even if they are not in the trash
parameters.name: ignoreTrash

parameters.description: Preserve parent folder if it is empty after deletion
parameters.name: preserveFolder

patch.summary: Move a list of files to a new parent folder

parameters.description: The folder to search in, defaults to the user's home folder
parameters.name: baseFolderID

get.summary: Get files shared with the logged in user

200.description: All the top-level files shared with the user

post.summary: structsore files from some time in the past

patch.summary: Move a list of files out of the trash, structsoring them to where they were before

get.summary: Get actions of a folder at a given time

parameters.description: Past timestamp to view the folder at, in ms since epoch
parameters.name: timestamp

get.summary: Get the statistics of a file
Get the text of a text file

parameters.description: Past timestamp to view the folder at, in ms since epoch
parameters.name: timestamp

patch.summary: Set the cover image of a folder

post.summary: Make sure all media is correctly synced with the file system
DANGEROUS. Drop all computed media and clear thumbnail in-memory and filesystem cache. Must be server owner.
Drop all computed media HDIR data. Must be server owner.

parameters.description: Number of random medias to get
parameters.name: count

get.summary: Get file of media by id

200.description: File info of file media was created from

post.summary: Add a user to a file share

delete.summary: Remove a user from a file share

post.description: Dispatch a task to create a zip file of the given files, or get the id of a previously created zip file if it already exists

get.summary: Get a page of file actions
Get the result of an upload task. This will block until the upload is complete

post.summary: Add a file to an upload task

put.summary: Add a chunk to a file upload

get.summary: Get all users, including (possibly) sensitive information like password hashes
Gets the user based on the auth token

400.description: Username autocomplete must contain at least 2 characters

head.summary: Check if username is already taken

patch.summary: Update display name of a user

400.description: Both oldPassword and newPassword fields are required

contentID.description: Hash of the file content, to ensure that the same files don't get duplicated

duration.description: Total time, in milliseconds, of a video

enabled.description:
If the media disabled. This can happen when the backing file(s) are deleted,
but the media stays behind because it can be re-used if needed.

fileIds.description: Slices of files whos content hash to the contentId

hidden.description:
If the media is hidden from the timeline
TODO - make this per user

owner.description: User who owns the file that resulted in this media being created

pageCount.description: Number of pages (typically 1, 0 in not a valid page count)

recognitionTags.description: Tags from the ML image scan so searching for particular objects in the images can be done

coreAddress.description:
Address of the remote server, only if the instance is a core.
Not set for any remotes/backups on core server, as it IS the core

reportedRole.description: Role the server is currently reporting. This is used to determine if the server is online (and functional) or not

doer.description: The user or system that performed the action

localID.description: For restoring a server, remoind the core of its serverID and api key the remote last used

scopes.admin: Grants read and write access to privileged data
